column4: inform yourself about zeitgeist here: http://gnomejournal.org/article/70/an-introduction-to-gnome-zeitgeist and then please stop insulting its developers by calling it spyware.
thanks for that, all is well now with the world.... what was I thinking?   I should just install a keylogger and while I'm at  it,  post my root password right here for ya....
if your not here to help,  then leave me alone
